text: Gore lo tle lo nne molato wa go tsholola madi a batho ba ba boifang Modimo ba ba bolailweng go simologa ka mosiami Abele go fitlhelela ka Sakaria (morwa Barakia), yo o bolailweng ke lona mo Tempeleng fa gare ga sebeso le felo ga boitshepo Ee, Katlholo yotlhe e e kgobokantsweng mo makgolong a dingwaga e tlaa wela mo ditlhogong tsa losika.
